application.doc: Retrieving the list of all existing API Access Control Policies

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving the list of all existing API Access Control Policies
method.doc: To retrieve the list of all existing API Access Control Policies with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control policy resource URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.
